name: mystery-egg
effect: Must be obtained to trigger the break-in at Professor Elm’s lab, the first rival battle, and access to johto route 31.

flavor_text.sun_moon: A mysterious Egg obtained from Mr. Pokémon. What is in the Egg is unknown.
flavor_text.ultra_sun_ultra_moon: A mysterious Egg obtained from Mr. Pokémon. What is in the Egg is unknown.
flavor_text.lets_go_pikachu_lets_go_eevee: A mysterious Egg obtained from Mr. Pokémon. What is in the Egg is unknown.
